pkgmetadata.longdescription: Finding Word Alignment Using IBM model 1 for a Given Parallel Corpus and Its Evaluation // For a given Sentence-Aligned Parallel Corpus, it aligns words for each sentence pair. It considers many-to-one and symmetrization alignments. Moreover, it evaluates word alignment based on this package and another software or even another method. It also builds a suggested dictionary of two languages based on given corpus.
